document_data.caption: A map showing the River Tath in Chult.
document_data.name: River Tath
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Tath''' was one of the three great rivers of [[Chult]].
document_data.Geography: The river was in the western region of the jungle and flowed from the [[Aldani Basin]] into the [[Trackless Sea]] between the [[Kobold Mountains]] and the [[Mistcliffs]] As it meandered to the west, it carved out the gorge of [[Ataaz Kahakla]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The [[aldani]] lived in this river, as in the other large rivers of Chult.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: It was said that if one were to follow the river up past Kahakla gorge, he or she would find a ruined city guarded by a wise and giving [[naga]], but few made it out alive.
